original_text: And out of his mouth goeth a sharp sword, that with it he should smite the nations: and he shall rule them with a rod of iron: and he treadeth the winepress of the fierceness and wrath of Almighty God.
korean_text: 그의 입에서 예리한 검이 나오니 그것으로 만국을 치겠고 친히 그들을 철장으로 다스리며 또 친히 하나님 곧 전능하신 이의 맹렬한 진노의 포도주 틀을 밟겠고

sentences.original_text: And out of his mouth goeth a sharp sword
that with it he should smite the nations
and he shall rule them with a rod of iron
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그들을 철장으로 다스릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: of the fierceness and wrath of Almighty God
